title: New: Outfit – Drakes
body:
Despite only being in existence for a matter of months, Liverpool band **Outfit** seem intent on reinventing their sound with every new track they release.

Whilst the previously heard [_Dashing In Passing_](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/14722-new-outfit-dashing-in-passing/) adopted a slick R ‘n’ B approach, new cut _Drakes_ takes a step back ever so slightly, building a more atmospheric yet still brilliantly enticing pop track. _Drakes_ is the first track to be taken from their upcoming EP **_Another Night’s Dreams Reach Earth Again_** out 14 May on [Double Denim](http://doubledenimrecords.bigcartel.com/). Check out _Drakes_ below.

Via [Abeano](http://www.abeano.com/outfit-drakes/12053)
